Sentencas: Renewable energy is a key solution in maintaining global warming below 2 degrees C.
Titulo: A novel integration of a green power-to-ammonia to power system: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell for hydrogen and power production coupled with an ammonia synthesis unit

Sentencas: However, its intermittency necessitates the need for energy conversion technologies to meet demand when there are insufficient renewable energy resources.
Titulo: A novel integration of a green power-to-ammonia to power system: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell for hydrogen and power production coupled with an ammonia synthesis unit

Sentencas: This study aims to tackle these challenges by thermo-electrochemical modelling and simulation of a reversible solid oxide fuel cell (RSOFC) and integration with the Haber Bosch process.
Titulo: A novel integration of a green power-to-ammonia to power system: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell for hydrogen and power production coupled with an ammonia synthesis unit

Sentencas: The novelty of the proposed system is usage of nitrogen-rich fuel electrode exhaust gas for ammonia synthesis during fuel cell mode, which is usually combusted to prevent release of highly flammable hydrogen into the environment.
Titulo: A novel integration of a green power-to-ammonia to power system: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell for hydrogen and power production coupled with an ammonia synthesis unit

Sentencas: RSOFC round-trip efficiencies of 41-53% have been attained when producing excess ammonia (144 kg NH3/hr) for the market and in-house consumption respectively.
Titulo: A novel integration of a green power-to-ammonia to power system: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell for hydrogen and power production coupled with an ammonia synthesis unit

Sentencas: The designed system has the lowest reported ammonia electricity consumption of 6.4-8.21 kWh/kg NH3, power-to-hydrogen, power-to-ammonia, and power-generation efficiencies of 80%, 55-71% and, 64-66%.
Titulo: A novel integration of a green power-to-ammonia to power system: Reversible solid oxide fuel cell for hydrogen and power production coupled with an ammonia synthesis unit
